channel.title: Weather on Jake Waddle's Sports Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Weather on Jake Waddle's Sports Data Blog

item.title: Gathering Historical NFL Weather Data
item.description: Introduction There’s just something about early fall that feels right. Step outside and the weather just feels like football. The flavor of Autumn we experience is obviously influenced by geographic region. It’s simple physics. I’m not sure if someone in Los Angeles can sense when football is near the same way someone in Arkansas can. All that to say, NFL games are played in most weather conditions imaginable as well as indoors.
